p.seg: ⅅ&aa;y l⁡ cu&oos;n truy&eej;n m⁡ nhi&eef;u ng&uw;&owf;i cho r&awf;ng th&ow; m&ooj;ng nh&aas;t ⅆ&ax; t&uwf;ng ⅆ&uw;&owj;c vi&ees;t, kh&oo;ng h&awr;n ch&ir; l⁡ cu&oos;n truy&eej;n vi&ees;t cho tr&er; em.

N&os; l⁡ m&ooj;t b&ar;n tuyⅇn ng&oo;n ⅆ&awj;c s&aws;c c&ur;a ch&ur; ngh&ix;a nh&aa;n ⅆ&aj;o, m&ooj;t ti&ees;ng chu&oo;ng c&ar;nh t&ir;nh tr&uw;&ows;c hi&eer;m h&oj;a l&ows;n lao c&ur;a h⁡nh tinh tr&uw;&ows;c s&uwj; ⅆiⅇn r&oof; c&ur;a nh&uwx;ng k&er; cu&oof;ng t&is;n.
Song trⅇn h&ees;t, ⅆ&aa;y l⁡ m&ooj;t cu&oos;n s&as;ch ca ng&owj;i t&if;nh yⅇu v⁡ c&as;i ⅆ&ej;p, ni&eef;m hy v&oj;ng l&ows;n c&ur;a con ng&uw;&owf;i.

M&ooj;t b⁡i th&ow; m⁡ cho d&uf; ng&uw;&owf;i ta ⅆ&ax; ⅆ&oj;c h⁡ng tr&aw;m l&aaf;n v&aax;n th&aas;y l&of;ng r&aj;o r&uwj;c m&oox;i khi ⅆ&oj;c l&aj;i, c&ux;ng nh&uw; m&oj;i t&as;c ph&aar;m kh&as;c m⁡ Saint-Exup&es;ry ⅆ&ax; ⅆ&eer; l&aj;i.

H&oof;i lⅇn s&as;u, c&os; l&aaf;n t&oo;i ⅆ&ax; nh&if;n th&aas;y m&ooj;t b&uws;c tranh tuy&eej;t ⅆ&ej;p trong m&ooj;t cu&oos;n s&as;ch n&os;i v&eef; r&uwf;ng hoang nhan ⅆ&eef; "Nh&uwx;ng chuy&eej;n c&os; th&aaj;t".
N&os; v&ex; m&ooj;t con tr&aw;n ⅆang nu&oos;t m&ooj;t con th&us;.
ⅅ&aa;y l⁡ b&ar;n sao c&ur;a b&uws;c tranh ⅆ&os;.
Ng&uw;&owf;i ta n&os;i trong s&as;ch: "Con tr&aw;n nu&oos;t ch&uwr;ng c&ar; con m&oof;i m⁡ kh&oo;ng nhai.
Sau ⅆ&os; n&os; kh&oo;ng th&eer; nh&us;c nh&is;ch ⅆ&uw;&owj;c n&uwx;a v⁡ n&os; n&awf;m ng&ur; s&as;u th&as;ng li&eef;n trong khi ch&owf; tiⅇu ho&as;."

T&uwf; ⅆ&os; t&oo;i hay ngh&ix; ⅆ&ees;n c&as;c cu&ooj;c phiⅇu l&uw;u trong r&uwf;ng r&aaj;m, v⁡ ⅆ&ees;n l&uw;&owj;t t&oo;i, v&ows;i m&ooj;t c&aa;y b&us;t ch&if; m⁡u, t&oo;i ⅆ&ax; v&ex; ⅆ&uw;&owj;c b&uws;c ph&as;c th&ar;o ⅆ&aaf;u tiⅇn.
B&uws;c ph&as;c th&ar;o ⅆ&aaf;u tiⅇn c&ur;a t&oo;i, n&os; nh&uw; th&ees; n⁡y:
T&oo;i ⅆem khoe ki&eej;t t&as;c c&ur;a m&if;nh v&ows;i nh&uwx;ng ng&uw;&owf;i l&ows;n v⁡ h∨i h&oj; r&awf;ng n&os; c&os; l⁡m h&oj; kinh h&ax;i kh&oo;ng.
H&oj; tr&ar;l&owf;i: "Sao l&aj;i ph&ar;i s&owj; m&ooj;t c&as;i m&ux; ch&uws;?"
B&uws;c v&ex; c&ur;a t&oo;i kh&oo;ng v&ex; m&ooj;t c&as;i m&ux;.
N&os; v&ex; m&ooj;t con tr&aw;n ⅆang n&awf;m ch&owf; tiⅇu ho&as; m&ooj;t con voi.
Th&ees; l⁡ t&oo;i ph&ar;i v&ex; ph&is;a trong c&ur;a con tr&aw;n, ⅆ&eer; cho ng&uw;&owf;i l&ows;n c&os; th&eer; hi&eer;u.
Ng&uw;&owf;i l&ows;n l&us;c n⁡o c&ux;ng c&aaf;n ph&ar;i c&os; gi&ar;i th&is;ch.
B&uws;c ph&as;c th&ar;o th&uws; hai c&ur;a t&oo;i n&os; nh&uw; th&ees; n⁡y:

Nh&uwx;ng ng&uw;&owf;i l&ows;n b&ef;n khuyⅇn t&oo;i nⅇn g&as;c sang m&ooj;t bⅇn c&as;c b&uws;c v&ex; tr&aw;n k&is;n v⁡ tr&aw;n m&owr; kia v⁡ nⅇn ch&us; t&aa;m h&oj;c ⅆ&ij;a l&ys;, s&uwr; k&ys;, t&is;nh to&as;n v⁡ v&aw;n ph&aj;m.
T&oo;i ⅆ&ax; b∨ d&owr; nh&uw; v&aaj;y ⅆ&os;, v⁡o n&aw;m lⅇn s&as;u, m&ooj;t s&uwj; nghi&eej;p h&ooj;i ho&aj; tuy&eej;t v&owf;i.
T&oo;i b&ij; th&aas;t v&oj;ng v&if; s&uwj; th&aas;t b&aj;i c&ur;a b&ar;n th&ar;o s&oos; m&ooj;t v⁡ s&oos; hai.
Nh&uwx;ng ng&uw;&owf;i l&ows;n ch&awr;ng bao gi&owf; t&uwj; h&oj; hi&eer;u ⅆ&uw;&owj;c c&as;i g&if; c&ar;, v⁡ th&aaj;t l⁡ m&eej;t cho tr&er; con l&us;c n⁡o c&ux;ng ph&ar;i gi&ar;i th&is;ch cho h&oj;.
V&aaj;y l⁡ t&oo;i ph&ar;i ch&oj;n ngh&eef; kh&as;c, v⁡ t&oo;i h&oj;c l&as;i m&as;y bay.
T&oo;i ⅆ&ax; bay kh&aws;p th&ees; gi&ows;i m&oox;i n&ow;i m&ooj;t t&is;.
V⁡ m&oo;n ⅆ&ij;a l&ys;, ⅆ&us;ng nh&uw; v&aaj;y, ⅆ&ax; gi&us;p t&oo;i r&aas;t nhi&eef;u.
T&oo;i bi&ees;t l⁡m th&ees; n⁡o ⅆ&eer; ch&ir; nh&if;n qua m&ooj;t c&as;i l⁡ ph&aa;n bi&eej;t ⅆ&uw;&owj;c ngay Trung Qu&oos;c v&ows;i Arizona.
C&as;i ⅆ&os; th&aaj;t l⁡ &is;ch l&owj;i n&ees;u nh&uw; ng&uw;&owf;i ta bay l&aj;c ⅆ&uw;&owf;ng trong ⅆⅇm t&oos;i.
T&oo;i c&ux;ng ⅆ&ax; g&awj;p trong ⅆ&owf;i t&oo;i c&ar; ⅆ&oos;ng nh&uwx;ng con ng&uw;&owf;i nghiⅇm ch&ir;nh.
T&oo;i ⅆ&ax; s&oos;ng nhi&eef;u v&ows;i nh&uwx;ng ng&uw;&owf;i l&ows;n.
T&oo;i ⅆ&ax; nh&if;n th&aas;y h&oj; r&aas;t l⁡ g&aaf;n.
Nh&uw;ng c&as;i ⅆ&os; ch&awr;ng l⁡m thay ⅆ&oor;i &ys; ki&ees;n c&ur;a t&oo;i bao nhiⅇu.

M&oox;i l&us;c g&awj;p m&ooj;t ng&uw;&owf;i l&ows;n c&os; v&er; s&as;ng s&ur;a m&ooj;t t&is;, t&oo;i l&aj;i th&uwr; &oo;ng ta b&awf;ng b&uws;c ph&as;c th&ar;o s&oos; m&ooj;t m⁡ t&oo;i lu&oo;n mang theo.
Nh&uw;ng lu&oo;n lu&oo;n &oo;ng ta tr&ar; l&owf;i: "ⅅ&aas;y l⁡ m&ooj;t c&as;i m&ux;".
Th&ees; l⁡ t&oo;i ch&awr;ng th&ef;m n&os;i v&ows;i &oo;ng ta v&eef; tr&aw;n r&aws;n, r&uwf;ng hoang hay c&as;c v&if; sao n&uwx;a.
T&oo;i t&uwj; h&aj; m&if;nh xu&oos;ng ngang t&aaf;m &oo;ng ta.
T&oo;i n&os;i v&eef; ch&ow;i b⁡i, ch&ow;i g&oo;n, ch&is;nh tr&ij; v⁡ cravat.
V⁡ con ng&uw;&owf;i l&ows;n kia c&ar;m th&aas;y h⁡i l&of;ng v&oo; c&uf;ng khi ⅆ&uw;&owj;c quen m&ooj;t con ng&uw;&owf;i bi&ees;t ⅆi&eef;u nh&uw; v&aaj;y.

T&oo;i ⅆ&ax; s&oos;ng c&oo; ⅆ&ow;n nh&uw; v&aaj;y ⅆ&os;, ch&awr;ng c&os; ai ⅆ&eer; chuy&eej;n tr&of; th&uwj;c s&uwj;, cho ⅆ&ees;n khi m&as;y bay c&ur;a t&oo;i b&ij; h∨ng gi&uwx;a sa m&aj;c Sahara, c&as;ch ⅆ&aa;y s&as;u n&aw;m.
C&os; c&as;i g&if; ⅆ&os; trong ⅆ&ooj;ng c&ow; c&ur;a t&oo;i b&ij; g&ax;y.
V⁡ t&oo;i ch&ir; ⅆi m&ooj;t m&if;nh kh&oo;ng c&os; h⁡nh kh&as;ch c&ux;ng ch&awr;ng c&os; th&owj; m&as;y, t&oo;i ph&ar;i m&ooj;t m&if;nh b&aws;t ⅆ&aaf;u cu&ooj;c s&uwr;a ch&uwx;a kh&os; kh&aw;n.
ⅅ&aas;y l⁡ v&aas;n ⅆ&eef; s&oos;ng ch&ees;t v&ows;i t&oo;i.
T&oo;i ch&ir; c&os; ⅆ&ur; n&uw;&ows;c ⅆ&eer; u&oos;ng trong nhi&eef;u nh&aas;t l⁡ t&as;m ng⁡y.
ⅅⅇm ⅆ&aaf;u tiⅇn v&aaj;y l⁡ t&oo;i ph&ar;i ng&ur; trⅇn c&as;t &owr; c&as;ch xa n&ow;i ng&uw;&owf;i &owr; h⁡ng ng⁡n d&awj;m.
L&us;c ⅆ&os; t&oo;i c&of;n c&oo; ⅆ&ooj;c h&ow;n c&ar; m&ooj;t k&er; ⅆ&aws;m t⁡u trⅇn chi&ees;c b&ef; lⅇnh ⅆⅇnh gi&uwx;a bi&eer;n.

B&aj;n ch&aws;c s&ex; t&uw;&owr;ng t&uw;&owj;ng ra n&oox;i kinh ng&aj;c c&ur;a t&oo;i, v⁡o l&us;c m&owf; s&as;ng, khi m&ooj;t gi&oj;ng n&os;i nh∨ nh&ej; ng&ooj; ngh&ix;nh ⅆ&as;nh th&uws;c t&oo;i d&aaj;y.
C&as;i gi&oj;ng &aas;y n&os;i:
- N&ees;u &oo;ng vui l&of;ng ...xin v&ex; h&ooj; t&oo;i m&ooj;t con c&uwf;u!
- C&as;i g&if;?
- Xin v&ex; h&ooj; t&oo;i m&ooj;t con c&uwf;u ...
T&oo;i nh&ar;y d&uwj;ng lⅇn nh&uw; l⁡ b&ij; s&es;t ⅆ&as;nh.
T&oo;i d&uj;i m&aws;t th&aaj;t k&yx;.
T&oo;i ⅆ&ax; nh&if;n th&aaj;t k&yx;.
V⁡ t&oo;i th&aas;y m&ooj;t c&aaj;u b&es; th&aaj;t kh&as;c th&uw;&owf;ng ⅆang nh&if;n t&oo;i v&ows;i v&er; nghiⅇm tr&oj;ng.
ⅅ&aa;y l⁡ b&uws;c ch&aa;n dung ⅆ&ej;p nh&aas;t m⁡ v&eef; sau t&oo;i v&ex; ⅆ&uw;&owj;c v&eef; c&aaj;u b&es; &aas;y.
Nh&uw;ng b&uws;c v&ex; c&ur;a t&oo;i ch&aws;c l⁡ k&es;m ⅆ&ej;p h&ow;n ng&uw;&owf;i m&aax;u nhi&eef;u.
Kh&oo;ng ph&ar;i l&oox;i t&aj;i t&oo;i.

T&oo;i ⅆ&ax; b&ij; ng&uw;&owf;i l&ows;n l⁡m cho n&ar;n l&of;ng trong s&uwj; nghi&eej;p h&ooj;i ho&aj; t&uwf; h&oof;i s&as;u tu&oor;i, v⁡ t&oo;i c&os; bao gi&owf; h&oj;c v&ex; c&as;i g&if; ngo⁡i nh&uwx;ng con tr&aw;n kh&es;p k&is;n v⁡ nh&uwx;ng con tr&aw;n m&owr; b&uj;ng ⅆ&aa;u.
V&aaj;y l⁡ t&oo;i nh&if;n c&as;i s&uwj; hi&eer;n hi&eej;n ⅆ&os; v&ows;i hai con m&aws;t tr&of;n xoe v&if; kinh ng&aj;c.
Xin nh&ows; l⁡ l&us;c &aas;y t&oo;i ⅆang &owr; c&as;ch m&oj;i ch&oox; c&os; ng&uw;&owf;i h⁡ng ng⁡n d&awj;m.

Th&ees; m⁡ c&aaj;u b&es; c&ur;a t&oo;i tr&oo;ng ch&awr;ng gi&oos;ng nh&uw; b&ij; l&aj;c ⅆ&uw;&owf;ng, ch&awr;ng h&eef; m&eej;t l&ar;, ch&awr;ng h&eef; ⅆ&os;i, ch&awr;ng h&eef; kh&as;t n&uw;&ows;c hay s&owj; h&ax;i g&if; c&ar;.
C&aaj;u ta ch&awr;ng c&os; v&er; g&if; c&ur;a m&ooj;t c&aaj;u b&es; l&aj;c gi&uwx;a sa m&aj;c, c&as;ch n&ow;i c&os; ng&uw;&owf;i c&ar; ng⁡n d&awj;m.
T&ows;i khi m&owr; ⅆ&uw;&owj;c mi&eej;ng, t&oo;i h∨i em:
- Nh&uw;ng ...em l⁡m c&as;i g&if; &owr; ⅆ&aa;y?
Th&ees; l⁡ em l&awj;p l&aj;i c&aa;u n&os;i l&us;c n&ax;y, th&aaj;t nh&ej; nh⁡ng, nh&uw; l⁡ m&ooj;t ⅆi&eef;u r&aas;t quan tr&oj;ng:
- N&ees;u &oo;ng vui l&of;ng ...xin v&ex; h&ooj; t&oo;i m&ooj;t con c&uwf;u ...
Khi m⁡ s&uwj; b&is; &aar;n qu&as; l&ows;n, ng&uw;&owf;i ta kh&oo;ng d&as;m kh&oo;ng v&aa;ng l&owf;i.

D&uf; ⅆi&eef;u n⁡y th&aaj;t l⁡ v&oo; l&ys; khi t&oo;i ⅆang &owr; c&as;ch xa n&ow;i ng&uw;&owf;i &owr; c&ar; ng⁡n d&awj;m v⁡ ⅆang b&ij; nguy ⅆ&ees;n t&is;nh m&aj;ng, t&oo;i r&us;t trong t&us;i ra m&ooj;t c&aa;y b&us;t v⁡ m&ooj;t m&ar;nh gi&aas;y.

Nh&uw;ng t&oo;i s&uwj;c nh&ows; r&awf;ng m&if;nh ⅆ&ax; ch&ir; h&oj;c ⅆ&ij;a l&ys;, s&uwr; k&ys;, t&is;nh to&as;n v⁡ v&aw;n ph&aj;m, v⁡ t&oo;i n&os;i v&ows;i c&aaj;u b&es; (c&os; v&er; h&ow;i kh&os; ch&ij;u) r&awf;ng t&oo;i kh&oo;ng bi&ees;t v&ex;.
Em tr&ar; l&owf;i t&oo;i:
- Kh&oo;ng sao ⅆ&aa;u.
Xin v&ex; h&ooj; t&oo;i m&ooj;t con c&uwf;u.
B&owr;i v&if; t&oo;i ch&uw;a bao gi&owf; v&ex; m&ooj;t con c&uwf;u c&ar; nⅇn t&oo;i v&ex; l&aj;i cho em m&ooj;t trong hai b&uws;c tranh m⁡ t&oo;i c&os; th&eer; v&ex;.
ⅅ&os; l⁡ h&if;nh con tr&aw;n k&is;n.
V⁡ t&oo;i s&uwx;ng s&owf; khi nghe c&aaj;u b&es; tr&ar; l&owf;i:
- Kh&oo;ng! Kh&oo;ng!
T&oo;i kh&oo;ng mu&oos;n m&ooj;t con voi trong b&uj;ng m&ooj;t con tr&aw;n ⅆ&aa;u.
Con tr&aw;n nguy hi&eer;m l&aws;m, c&of;n con voi th&if; qu&as; k&eef;nh c⁡ng.
Ch&oox; t&oo;i b&es; l&aws;m.
T&oo;i c&aaf;n m&ooj;t con c&uwf;u.
H&ax;y v&ex; cho t&oo;i m&ooj;t con c&uwf;u!
Th&ees; l⁡ t&oo;i v&ex;.
Em nh&if;n ch&aw;m ch&us;, r&oof;i n&os;i:
- Kh&oo;ng! Con n⁡y &oos;m qu&as;.
H&ax;y v&ex; con kh&as;c ⅆi.
T&oo;i v&ex;.
C&aaj;u b&es; c&ur;a t&oo;i c&uw;&owf;i nh&ej;, gi&oj;ng khoan dung:
- &OO;ng th&aas;y ⅆ&aas;y ...ⅆ&aa;y kh&oo;ng ph&ar;i con c&uwf;u, ⅆ&aa;y l⁡ dⅇ.
N&os; c&os; s&uwf;ng ...
T&oo;i l&aj;i v&ex; l&aj;i l&aaf;n n&uwx;a.
Nh&uw;ng b&uws;c n⁡y c&ux;ng b&ij; t&uwf; ch&oos;i nh&uw; c&as;c b&uws;c tr&uw;&ows;c.
- Con n⁡y gi⁡ qu&as;.
T&oo;i mu&oos;n m&ooj;t con c&uwf;u s&oos;ng th&aaj;t l&aa;u.
B&aas;y gi&owf; t&oo;i h&ees;t kiⅇn nh&aax;n, b&owr;i s&oos;t ru&ooj;t mu&oos;n b&aws;t ⅆ&aaf;u th&as;o m&as;y, t&oo;i v&ex; ngu&eej;ch ngo&aj;c b&uws;c v&ex; n⁡y ⅆ&aa;y.
V⁡ t&oo;i n&os;i b&uwf;a:
- ⅅ&aa;y l⁡ c&as;i th&uf;ng.
Con c&uwf;u ch&us; mu&oos;n n&os; &owr; trong &aas;y ⅆ&aas;y.
Nh&uw;ng t&oo;i h&ees;t s&uws;c ng&aj;c nhiⅇn khi th&aas;y m&awj;t v&ij; quan to⁡ nh∨ c&ur;a t&oo;i s&as;ng r&ox; lⅇn:
- ⅅ&us;ng l⁡ c&as;i m⁡ t&oo;i mu&oos;n ⅆ&aas;y!
&OO;ng ngh&ix; c&os; c&aaf;n nhi&eef;u c∨ cho con c&uwf;u n⁡y kh&oo;ng &aj;?
- Sao v&aaj;y?
- V&if; ch&oox; t&oo;i b&es; l&aws;m ...
- Ch&aws;c l⁡ ⅆ&ur;.
T&oo;i v&ex; cho em m&ooj;t con c&uwf;u b&es; x&is;u &aas;y m⁡.
Em c&us;i ⅆ&aaf;u xu&oos;ng b&uws;c v&ex;:
- Kh&oo;ng nh∨ l&aws;m ⅆ&aa;u ...K&if;a!
N&os; ⅆ&ax; ng&ur; r&oof;i ...
V⁡ nh&uw; th&ees; ⅆ&aas;y, t&oo;i ⅆ&ax; l⁡m quen v&ows;i &oo;ng ho⁡ng b&es; nh∨.
Ph&ar;i r&aas;t l&aa;u t&oo;i m&ows;i bi&ees;t em t&uwf; ⅆ&aa;u ⅆ&ees;n.
&OO;ng ho⁡ng b&es; nh∨, v&oos;n r&aas;t hay ⅆ&awj;t c&aa;u h∨i cho t&oo;i, l&aj;i d&uw;&owf;ng nh&uw; kh&oo;ng bao gi&owf; ch&us; &ys; nghe t&oo;i h∨i.
Ch&ir; v&if; nh&uwx;ng ti&ees;ng ng&aax;u nhiⅇn bu&ooj;t ra d&aaf;n d&aaf;n n&os;i cho t&oo;i hi&eer;u m&oj;i s&uwj;.

V&is; d&uj; nh&uw;, khi l&aaf;n ⅆ&aaf;u em th&aas;y chi&ees;c m&as;y bay c&ur;a t&oo;i (t&oo;i s&ex; kh&oo;ng v&ex; chi&ees;c m&as;y bay ⅆ&aa;u, b&uws;c v&ex; ⅆ&os; qu&as; ph&uws;c t&aj;p ⅆ&oos;i v&ows;i t&oo;i) em h∨i t&oo;i:

T&oo;i t&uwj; h⁡o n&os;i cho em bi&ees;t l⁡ t&oo;i bay.

&OO;ng t&uwf; trⅇn tr&owf;i r&ow;i xu&oos;ng &uw;?

C&as;i n⁡y ng&ooj; ⅆ&aas;y ...
V⁡ &oo;ng ho⁡ng b&es; nh∨ b&aaj;t lⅇn m&ooj;t tr⁡ng c&uw;&owf;i khanh kh&as;ch r&aas;t kh&as;u nh&uw;ng l⁡m t&oo;i c&as;u l&aws;m.
T&oo;i mu&oos;n ai c&ux;ng ph&ar;i ⅆ&as;nh gi&as; m&ooj;t c&as;ch nghiⅇm t&us;c m&oj;i tai n&aj;n c&ur;a t&oo;i.
